entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 6 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10 except minus 6 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
